author: Stereogum
title: Watch Foo Fighters, Norah Jones, & Gary Clark Jr. Cover Tom Petty At MusiCares Tribute
text: Tom Petty was honored as the 2017 MusiCares Person Of The Year at the foundation's annual pre-Grammys gala in LA last night. In addition to performances from Petty himself, who was joined by Stevie Nicks on "Stop Draggin' My Heart Around" and "Insider" and by Jeff Lynne and Dhani Harrison on "I Won't Back … More »
